string-array.name: music
string-array.item: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything
If music be the food of love, play on.
Music doesn\'t lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue
The world\'s most famous and popular language is music.
Music is the strongest form of magic.
Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
Music happens to be an art form that transcends language
One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain
Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent.
Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
Music is what feelings sound like.
Music is the poetry of the air.
Music is the art which is most nigh to tears and memory.
Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together.
Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
Music cleanses the understanding; inspires it, and lifts it into a realm which it would not reach if it were left to itself.
Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything
Without music, life would be a mistake.
Music is what tells us that the human race is greater than we realize.
Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without
Music is the universal language of mankind.
